mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS 'boardNo', CATEGORY AS 'category', USER_EMAIL AS 'userEmail', SUBJECT AS 'subject', CONTENT AS 'content', VIEW_CNT AS 'viewCnt', REPLY_CNT AS 'replyCnt', LIKE_CNT AS 'likeCnt', DISLIKE_CNT AS 'disLikeCnt', CREATE_TIME AS 'createTime' FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE CASE WHEN (#{column} = 'CATEGORY' AND #{data} = 'all') THEN 1 = 1 ELSE ${column} = #{data} END
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO (BOARD_NO,CATEGORY, USER_EMAIL, SUBJECT, CONTENT) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{category}, #{userEmail}, #{subject}, #{content})
